## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                                        | Type      | Default                                 |
| ---------- | ---------- | -------------------------------------------------- | --------- | --------------------------------------- |
| `disabled` | `disabled` | Determines, whether the control is disabled or not | `boolean` | `undefined`                             |
| `icon`     | `icon`     |                                                    | `string`  | `SvgRegistry.getIcon('stroke', 'menu')` |
| `label`    | `label`    |                                                    | `string`  | `undefined`                             |
| `menu`     | `menu`     | Determines, which menu is assigned to this trigger | `string`  | `undefined`                             |
